channel.title: Raw Model/Texture Assets Publically Available?
channel.description:
Particularly looking for the smd/dmx/QC files for the face creation system, and the weapon view model arms. Are these (and/or any other pre-compile model files) available for public download/use? Would rather get them from the source than try to decompile things and hope they work right.
Would also be a big help to see how you guys make your textures with their raw files as well, help ensure things I make fit Black Mesa's style.
Anything you would be willing to part with would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Raw Model/Texture Assets Publically Available?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Not as of yet. It’s a logistical and legal obstacle.

Bard was talking about this a while back. The folder containing the source files for the Tau’s textures totals 4GB in size. Yikes!

Read full topic
